game.name: No Way Out
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: No Way Out is an adventure game where the protagonist, Dariane, must escape from a mansion with no escape route, haunted by two mysterious figures. You control Dariane, aiming to escape the mansion without being spotted by the wandering pair. Play solo and overcome the loneliness to achieve victory.
